fields.review: The customer support was prompt and my referrer was also a nice person. We're still in touch.

My last job was also through a referral, but from my uncle's friend. This was easier and quicker. I didn't need to ask for favours or speak to several people in order to find the right person to refer me.
It was simple - I selected a job and saw someone in that company who could refer me. Round One set up a call and I impressed him on the phone so he referred me. I then got called for an interview
Without a job referral, HR would never even have noticed my resume.

fields.question: What are the chances of getting hired through a referral?
fields.answer: Research shows that referrals increase your chances of getting hired by ten times, which is much higher than any other source. So get referred today, and get hired soon!

fields.question: How will I get my Referral?
fields.answer: You must request referrals for jobs listed on the site. Once your request is accepted, a call is arranged between you and the referrer. After the call, we will inform you of the referrer's decision regarding your referral

fields.question: Why will the employee refer me?
fields.answer: Employees in most companies receive large bonuses if they refer someone and that person gets hired. But most employees don't know too many qualified candidates whom they can refer. Round One connects them to qualified candidates like yourself, so they can speak with you and decide whether to refer you.

fields.question: Who will refer me?
fields.answer: An employee in the company and department where the job opening is, will refer you. That employee has signed up because they are interested to meet job seekers like yourself, and their identity has been verified by Round One.

fields.question: Why does a job referral increase my chances of getting hired?
fields.answer: A referral is a recommendation from a current employee in the organization. Employers trust the judgement of current employees, so when they recommend someone, the company prioritizes that application over others and gives you a significant edge over the competition
